results.deck: Toys for Bob is the developer behind Star Control I & II. Most recently they developed the toy-based Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure.
results.description:
Founded in 1989 by Paul Reiche III and Fred Ford, Toys For Bob is a small California-based developer. In the early 1990's they had a hit in their hands with their first two games, the popular Star Control & Star Control II (They did not develop the third game in the franchise.) After this, they went on to develop some lesser known titles for Crystal Dynamics until 2002.

In 2005 they were purchased by Activision, and had another hit in 2011 with the kid-oriented game Skylanders, a toy-based action adventure game that used plastic figurines to determine the in-game characters.
results.name: Toys for Bob

concept.name: Letters Replaced by Numbers in Title
